alert.note: Alert for Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 06 at 4:07AM AKDT until October 08 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Golovin. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Low lying areas could flood causing damage to fish or hunting camps along the coast. Significant erosion is possible. In Golovin, the old runway may be inundated. West of Golovin, high surf is anticipated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels are expected to rise 3 to 5 feet above normal high tide line. The highest water levels are expected with the high tides early Thursday morning, and again Friday morning then remain high through early Saturday.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
